name: Dark World Burger
description:
A JRPG about the production, distribution, and consumption of meat in the Dark World. As an Employee, your duty is to serve customers, respect the authority of your manager, and avoid forming any independent thoughts. Please suppress any and all rising urges to kill. Please clean your workstation properly. 

This game is currently in development, which is why it's unlisted. If you somehow found this, feel free to leave your feedback in the comments section below.
